title: What will next few months look like for NFL? Jamal Adams' future with the Jets, quarterback tiers (Football 5/27)
description:
What could training camps around the league look like in July? Well, Jason La Canfora attempts to break down the state of the league at the moment based on conversations that he's had with those in the NFL about their upcoming plans (2:00). Next, JLC details to Will Brinson the latest with Jamal Adams (13:00). Why won't the Jets just pay up? The Cowboys are well-known potential trade partners, but who else could make a play for the All-Pro safety? Finally, an examination of Jason's quarterback tiers (23:45), with a focus on Ben Roethlisberger, Dak Prescott, Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JasonLaCanfora
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
